official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the limitation on capital loss applicable to individuals.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase the limit on the deductibility of losses from the sale or exchange of capital assets for individual taxpayers to $10,000. Provides for an inflation adjustment to such increased amount after 2008.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the limitation on capital loss applicable to individuals.
